alert.note: Alert for Arkansas; Jefferson; Lonoke; Monroe; Prairie (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 09 at 4:15AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Prairie, southeastern Lonoke, west central Monroe, north central Jefferson and northwestern Arkansas Counties through 445 AM CST... At 415 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Humnoke to 6 miles north of Altheimer. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Stuttgart... Humphrey... Humnoke... Almyra... Ulm... Roe... Brummitt... Stuttgart Municipal Airport... Wabbaseka... Allport... Coy... Aberdeen... Gethsemane... Almyra Airport... Tomberlin... Casscoe... Seaton... Bayou Meteo State Game Area... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
